patterns: where can I see my marks
responses: You can see your exam results on CUIMS by going to Examination>Results
You can see your marks on CUIMS by going to Examination>Student Marks View
Please contact your Class Representative for your respective mentor contact details

patterns: where can I find my datesheet
how do I see my datesheet
when will be exams be conducted
responses: You can find your datesheet by logging on to CUIMS and navigating to the Examination tab and clicking on My Date Sheet
